data.claim: Grid Systems: Use 8-point grid (multiples of 8px for spacing: 8, 16, 24, 32px). 12-column grid for desktop (divides into halves, thirds, fourths, sixths), 3-4 columns tablet, 1-2 columns mobile. Three grid types: Column (vertical divisions), Modular (columns + rows matrix), Hierarchical (by content importance). Components: columns (content areas), gutters (space between columns), margins (outer edges). Content goes IN columns, never gutters.
